official_title: Calcium: Magnesium Balance, Microbiota, and Necroptosis and Inflammation
inclusion_criteria:
• Participants from the parent study (Personalized Prevention of Colorectal Cancer Trial, NCT#01105169, IRB#100106)
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 40 Years
Must have maximum age of 85 Years
exclusion_criteria: • Participants did not provide any stool/swab/rectal biopsy sample in the parent study
